translation.en: [woman] People think dreams are an escape.
translation.fr:
Les gens pensent
que les rêves sont une évasion.

translation.en: [woman] A chance to slip away from waking life to a world with no consequence.
translation.fr:
Une occasion de fuir le monde réel,
vers un monde sans conséquences.

translation.en: -But that's not true. -[haunting choral music playing]
[woman] Your dreams don't just happen.
translation.fr: Vos rêves n'arrivent pas comme ça.

translation.en: We make them happen.
And we design them with care just for you.
translation.fr:
Nous les concevons avec soin,
rien que pour vous.

translation.en: We have our reasons, and we have our rules.
translation.fr:
Nous avons nos raisons,
et nous avons nos règles.

translation.en: We make your dreams to help you on your journey.
translation.fr:
Nous fabriquons vos rêves
pour vous aider sur votre chemin.

translation.en: And where this one's going, she's gonna need all the help she can get.
translation.fr: Et là où va cette fillette, elle va avoir besoin de toute notre aide.

translation.en: [exhales] Good morning, Pig.
-Morning, Bugsy. -[Bugsy squawks]
-[Dad grunting] -[girl] Hey, Dad. What'd you get?
[sighs] Many leagues have I traveled across the sea to bring you breakfast.
translation.fr:
J'ai traversé les mers
pour t'apporter le petit-déjeuner.

translation.en: Oh. Thank you. Here. Here, let me help you with that.
-Is that better? -Thank you.
-Hey, Bugsy! -[Bugsy squawks]
[Dad] All right.
Batter up.
And… batter up.
-[breeze blowing] -[Dad] We on course, kiddo?
translation.fr: On tient le cap, ma grande ?

translation.en: [girl] The wind's come around.
So what're you gonna do?
Bow up.
-[tiller squeaks] -Bow up.
-[wrench straining] -A little more. Little more.
[Dad] Here ya go, kiddo.
His name is Fred.
Oh, hi, Fred.
And I've got Seymour.
Dad, why do I have to learn math
translation.fr: Papa, pourquoi je dois faire des maths,

translation.en: if I'm gonna take care of the lighthouse, like you?
translation.fr: vu que je vais reprendre le phare ?

translation.en: I already know everything there is to know about the lighthouse anyway.
translation.fr:
Je sais déjà tout ce qu'il y a à savoir,
de toute façon.

translation.en: Answer me this question.
What is a lighthouse for?
To keep ships safe.
[Dad] No. That's not what it's for.
translation.fr: Non, il ne sert pas à ça.

translation.en: But when you can answer that question…
I'll give you the key to the lighthouse, and that's a promise.
translation.fr: je te donnerai la clé du phare, promis.

translation.en: -[girl gasps softly] -[Dad] Now, bed.
You don't want Pig? [clicks tongue] I am 11.
translation.fr:
- Tu ne veux pas M'sieur Cochon ?
- J'ai 11 ans.

translation.en: Well, sorry, Pig. It's a rite of passage.
translation.fr:
Désolé, M'sieur Cochon.
C'est un rite de passage.

translation.en: What's that?
Oh, no. No, you don't have to worry. I'll still be here for you.
translation.fr:
Non, ne t'inquiète pas.
Je serai toujours là pour toi.

translation.en: All right. Well, good night.
Wait!
-[Dad] Hmm? -One story?
-Flip story? -[girl gasps excitedly]
All right.
I got one you never heard before.
As you know, Flip and I, we lived the outlaw life. Hmm?
translation.fr:
Comme tu le sais, Flip et moi,
on vivait comme des hors-la-loi.

translation.en: Hunting treasure every night, and… eh, what have you.
translation.fr:
On passait nos nuits à chasser
des trésors, tu vois le genre.

translation.en: Now, one day ol' Flippy comes up to me, and he says, "Guess what I've heard."
translation.fr:
Un jour, Flip me lance :
"Tu sais ce que j'ai entendu ?"

translation.en: [quietly] He's heard about these Pearls. Magic Pearls.
translation.fr: Il a entendu parler de perles. De perles magiques.

translation.en: You get one of these Pearls, and you can wish for whatever you want.
translation.fr: Si on en trouve une, on a un vœu exaucé.

translation.en: The trouble was that these Pearls can only be found
translation.fr:
Le problème,
c'est que ces perles ne se trouvent

translation.en: in the most dangerous waters known to mankind.
translation.fr:
que dans les eaux les plus dangereuses
connues de l'humanité.

translation.en: -[eerie music playing] -The Sea of Nightmares.
Well, soon as I heard that, I was all, "Count me out. I don't want anything to do with it."
translation.fr:
En entendant ça, je dis :
"Sans moi, je m'embarque pas là-dedans."

translation.en: Then, of course, Flip, you know him, he goes and he does… the Double-Knock.
translation.fr:
Mais bien sûr, tu connais Flip,
il fait un double toc.

translation.en: And when your partner does the Double-Knock--
translation.fr: Quand l'autre fait un double toc…

translation.en: -You can't refuse. -[Dad] That's right. [both] Outlaw Code.
translation.fr:
- On peut pas refuser.
- Voilà. Code des hors-la-loi.

translation.en: Set sail, we did.
Well, I tell you what, it was cold. It was mighty cold.
translation.fr:
Je peux te dire qu'il faisait froid.
Sacrément froid.

translation.en: But I was thinking, well,
in that kind of climate, Flip might not smell so bad.
translation.fr:
que par ce froid,
Flip sentirait moins mauvais.

translation.en: Then the storm came.
[softly] And the waves.
-Suddenly there was this rumbling sound. -[thunder rumbles]
-It was all around us. -[floorboards creak]
-[Dad] And it grew louder by the second. -[wind picks up]
translation.fr: De plus en plus fort à chaque seconde.

translation.en: [Dad] It was the biggest, deadliest whirlpool I'd ever seen.
translation.fr:
C'était le plus gros et redoutable
tourbillon que j'aie jamais vu.

translation.en: That boom swung around, hit me on the backside, and tossed me into that water.
translation.fr:
La bôme a pivoté, a percuté mon derrière
et m'a balancé à la flotte.

translation.en: And down I went, like a lead weight.
translation.fr: J'ai sombré comme un kilo de plomb.

translation.en: Down… and down,
until I noticed there was a hole right there in the bottom of the sea.
translation.fr: Et puis, j'ai repéré un trou, tout au fond de la mer.

translation.en: So I swam in.
What's on the other side?
translation.fr: Il y a quoi, de l'autre côté ?

translation.en: It's a dead place.
No life of any kind,
just littered with bones of ancient sea creatures.
translation.fr:
Jonché d'ossements
de créatures des mers.

translation.en: That's when it came for me.
The monster.
-It rose up out of the darkness. -[low growling]
[Dad] Black as night, and bigger than any creature I had ever seen.
translation.fr:
noir comme la nuit et plus énorme
que ce que j'avais jamais vu,

translation.en: With long, smoky, inky tentacles.
translation.fr: avec de longs tentacules pleins d'encre.

translation.en: I was frozen in fear.
And it just, kind of slowly…
-[distorted] …slowly… -[monster snarls]
…reached out and grabbed me and shook me for all I was worth! And I take--
translation.fr:
il m'a attrapé,
secoué comme un prunier, et moi…

translation.en: Stand by.
-[radio chatter continues] -Wait, you can't stop now.
What? You mean during the scary part?
-It wasn't scary. -[Dad] Mm-hmm.
It was a potentially interesting start to a story.
-[Dad] Go for Peter. -Potentially… interesting start.
[Peter] Copy.
-[indistinct radio chatter] -[Peter] Nemo, listen to me. There's a fishing boat off Lopez that's in trouble.
translation.fr:
Nemo, un bateau de pêche
est en péril au large de l'île Lopez.

translation.en: It's gonna get bad out there tonight.
Listen, you know what to do if the power goes out, right?
translation.fr:
Tu sais quoi faire
si le courant se coupe ?

translation.en: Fire up the backup generator,
translation.fr: Allumer le générateur, vidanger la pompe,

translation.en: clear the sump pump, radio Carla if there's a problem.
translation.fr: Allumer le générateur, vidanger la pompe, appeler Carla au besoin.

translation.en: [giggling] I got it, Dad.
Sweet dreams.
Hey… I got you.
[inhales sharply] Stop.
Good night.
[Peter] Good night. I'll be back soon.
[echoing] Dad?
Help! Help!
Carla?
[Nemo] Carla, where's my dad?
Nemo,
he's gone, honey.
He's gone.
[shakily] I'm sorry.
-[Nemo crying] -[Carla] Those were his wishes. Did he talk with you about any of this?
translation.fr:
C'était sa volonté.
Il vous en avait parlé ?

translation.en: Her mother died when she was a baby, so she's used to a single-parent household.
translation.fr:
Sa mère est morte quand elle était bébé,
elle est habituée à n'avoir qu'un parent.

translation.en: She doesn't have anybody else.
It's you, or she becomes a ward of the state. They'll stick her in a group home or in foster…
translation.fr:
C'est vous ou elle est pupille de l'État,
placée en foyer ou en famille d'accueil.

translation.en: Nemo, do you remember your uncle?
translation.fr: Tu te souviens de ton oncle ?

translation.en: No. I've never met him before.
Your dad left instructions.
translation.fr: Ton père a laissé des consignes.

translation.en: If anything ever happened to him…
translation.fr: Au cas où il lui arriverait malheur,

translation.en: he wanted you to go and stay with your uncle in the city.
translation.fr:
il voulait que tu ailles
chez ton oncle en ville.

translation.en: But I have to take care of the lighthouse.
translation.fr: Mais je dois m'occuper du phare.

translation.en: Nemo, you can't live alone.
translation.fr: Nemo, tu ne peux pas vivre toute seule.

translation.en: But I can do it. I know how. He's taught me everything.
translation.fr:
Si, je peux.
Je sais faire, il m'a tout appris.

translation.en: -[Carla] I'm sorry, honey. -[Nemo breathing shakily]
[man] "For tho' from out our bourne Of Time and Place
translation.fr:
"Car, des confins
où l'homme un temps est attardé,

translation.en: The flood may bear me far"
"I hope to see my Pilot face to face
translation.fr:
"j'espère voir face à face
celui qui m'a guidé,

translation.en: When I have crost the bar"
[softly] That's him.
[quietly] Hello?
No, it's not a good time.
My uh… My brother was lost at sea.
translation.fr: Mon frère a disparu en mer.

translation.en: Mm. No, lost lost. Like, I'm at his funeral.
translation.fr:
Non, vraiment disparu.
Je suis à ses obsèques.

translation.en: We were estranged, actually.
translation.fr: Nous étions en froid, à vrai dire.

translation.en: Estranged.
I'm… I'm happy with my plan.
translation.fr: Je suis content de mon forfait.

translation.en: -Carla. -Hello.
Hello.
[sighs] I'm so sorry for your loss.
Our loss, obviously.
Um, we can…
We better hit the road if we're gonna catch the ferry.
translation.fr:
On doit y aller,
si on ne veut pas rater le ferry.

translation.en: -[horn honks] -Uh, no shoes on the carpet.
-Oh, I'm sorry. -No…
It's a great building. You never have to leave. [chuckles]
translation.fr:
Cet immeuble est génial.
On n'a même pas besoin de sortir.

translation.en: Which I basically never do 'cause I work from home.
translation.fr:
D'ailleurs, je ne sors jamais,
je travaille de chez moi.

translation.en: Sorry.
There's a dry cleaner's, a coffee shop.
translation.fr: Il y a un pressing, un café.

translation.en: They even have a, um… a spinning studio downstairs.
translation.fr: Et même un studio de spinning en bas.

translation.en: Are you into spinning?
Like spinning around?
I don't know. I… I've never tried it.
translation.fr: Aucune idée, je n'ai jamais essayé.

translation.en: Do you like doorknobs?
translation.fr: Tu aimes les poignées de porte ?

translation.en: These are my babies.
You're a doorknob salesman?
[scoffs] I'm not… I'm not a doorknob salesman.
translation.fr: Je ne suis pas vendeur de poignées.

translation.en: I own a company that sells doorknobs.
translation.fr:
J'ai une société
qui vend des poignées de porte,

translation.en: We sell latches. We sell escutcheons.
Here's where we differ.
A lot of the glamour boys in the industry, they chase the latest trends, not us.
translation.fr:
Les mecs branchés du secteur traquent
les dernières tendances, pas nous.

translation.en: No, thank you. We'll stick with the classics.
'Cause it's security. It's not fashion.
translation.fr: C'est de la sécurité, pas de la mode.

translation.en: -Don't touch that. -Oh, I'm sorry. I'm sorry.
That's not a toy.
This is an antique.
Came from a prison cell in Alcatraz.
In case I need to lock you in your room. [chuckles]
translation.fr: Si jamais je veux t'enfermer à clé.

translation.en: I-- I-- I'm not gonna lock you in your room.
translation.fr: Je ne vais pas t'enfermer dans ta chambre.

translation.en: That was… humor.
[splutters] Do you need a hug or whatever?
translation.fr: Tu veux un câlin, ou quelque chose ?

translation.en: No.
Well, good night.
[Nemo, softly] I know, Pig. I wish we could be with him again too.
translation.fr:
Oui, M'sieur Cochon.
Moi aussi, j'aimerais être avec lui.

translation.en: Pig.
-What? -[Pig oinks]
Wait!
[Nemo] Don't! Stop, stop! Wait!
Stop! Pause. Pause. Pause. Pause.
[Nemo] Red light. Stop!
-[tapping] Red light! -[Pig oinks]
-Come on, Pig. -[Pig squealing]
-[taps] Thanks. -[Pig grunts]
-[Nemo] Hi, Bugsy. -[Bugsy caws]
Dad?
-[loud thumping upstairs] -Dad?
Dad?
Who are you?
Nobody? [laughs nervously]
I'm just one of those weird things that happens in dreams.
translation.fr:
Juste une bizarrerie
qui arrive dans les rêves.

translation.en: Ignore me. I'm leaving now.
translation.fr: Oublie-moi, je ne suis pas là.

translation.en: [man, high-pitched] Come back later. We're doin' dishes.
translation.fr: Revenez plus tard, on fait la vaisselle.

translation.en: [gruffly] 'Kay, so that didn't work.
So, you're the kid.
What are you doing here?
And where's my dad?
[scoffs] Nobody told you?
I know what happened.
translation.fr: Je sais ce qui s'est passé.

translation.en: [sighs, grunts] Well, your dad and I were partners a long time ago,
translation.fr: Ton père et moi, on a été associés.

translation.en: before he went straight and had a kid.
translation.fr: Avant qu'il se range et fasse un gosse.

translation.en: Big mistake, in my opinion. [chuckles slightly, sighs deeply]
[snarling] Mad, bad, and dangerous to know.
Named Flip. -You're Flip? -[grunts softly] Yeah.
I thought you were something my dad made up, and you're different than I imagined.
translation.fr:
Je croyais que mon père t'avait inventé,
et je t'imaginais autrement.

translation.en: Handsomer?
More "gorgeous-er," if you will?
Hairier.
-And… [sniffs] …smellier. -[Flip] Hmm.
I mean, I know you're not real,
translation.fr: Je sais que tu n'es pas réel,

translation.en: but I always pictured, like, a normal human being.
translation.fr:
mais je t'imaginais
comme un être humain normal.

translation.en: Okay, you just said like four insulting things on top of each other.
translation.fr:
Tu viens de me balancer
quatre insultes à la suite.

translation.en: Rude.
-Listen, I just came to pay my respects. -[fly buzzes, splats]
translation.fr: Je venais lui rendre un dernier hommage.

translation.en: [chewing] Sorry for your loss. Hi-yah!
By ripping my dad's room apart?
translation.fr: En saccageant la chambre de mon père ?

translation.en: Oh, that reminds me…
[chuckling] …your dad, he had a map.
About this big. Weird shapes and lines all over it.
translation.fr:
De cette taille,
de drôles de formes et de lignes dessus.

translation.en: Picture with an oyster with a pearl on the back of it.
translation.fr: Une huître et une perle dessinées au dos.

translation.en: It's one-of-a-kind, kid. We risked our lives stealing it.
translation.fr:
Elle est unique, petite.
On a risqué nos vies pour la voler.

translation.en: -I never saw any map like that. -[Flip] Don't lie to me, kid!
translation.fr:
- J'ai jamais vu de carte…
- Ne mens pas, petite !

translation.en: Your dad would want me to have it.
translation.fr: Ton père aurait voulu que je l'aie.

translation.en: I'm not lying.
Never mind, I'll find it myself. [blows a raspberry]
Hey, you can't just bust in here like some kind of thief.
translation.fr:
Tu peux pas débarquer comme ça,
comme un voleur.

translation.en: -You say thief like it's a bad thing. -[glass shatters]
A thief just takes things that don't belong to them.
translation.fr: On prend juste ce qui n'est pas à nous.

translation.en: You can't take things from other people's dreams.
translation.fr: Tu peux pas piller les rêves des autres.

translation.en: [scoffs] Sure you can. Ya just gotta know how to get in and get out.
translation.fr:
Bien sûr que si, il suffit
de savoir comment entrer et sortir.

translation.en: I'm in your dream.
You're just a figment of my imagination.
translation.fr: Tu es le fruit de mon imagination.

translation.en: You wish you could dream up somethin' this good. Look at that.
translation.fr: Rêver aussi beau que ça ? Tu rêves !

translation.en: Mm! I look good.
Please! I don't want you here.
translation.fr: Arrête ! Je veux pas de toi ici.

translation.en: I just want my dad.
What if there is a way you can see your dad again?
translation.fr:
Et s'il y avait un moyen
que tu le revoies ?

translation.en: What do you mean?
I'm goin' on a little treasure hunt, and this treasure… is magic.
translation.fr:
Je pars pour une petite chasse au trésor,
et ce trésor-là est magique.

translation.en: Lets you wish for whatever you want here in Slumberland.
translation.fr: Il permet d'exaucer n'importe quel vœu.

translation.en: I could see my dad again.
Oh, yeah, you can see your dad again. Right here, every night.
translation.fr:
Oui, comme revoir ton père.
Ici, tous les soirs.

translation.en: But I'm gonna need that map, kid.
translation.fr: Mais il me faut cette carte, petite.

translation.en: -[tense music playing] -I don't know what you're talking about.
translation.fr: Je sais pas de quoi tu parles.

translation.en: [sucks teeth] Yeah, I believe you.
Hey, wait! I can try to find the map. I can still come with you.
translation.fr:
Attends !
Je peux la chercher, et venir avec toi.

translation.en: Oh, that sounds super fun.
Except you got no gear, no skills, and without the map… oh, you're useless to me.
translation.fr:
Mais sans équipement, sans savoir-faire
et sans carte, tu me sers à rien.

translation.en: -[Nemo gasps] -Time to wake up, kid.
translation.fr: Il est temps de te réveiller.

translation.en: A map.
Oh, you're up already. Good.
What are you doin'?
What's the weirdest dream you've ever had?
translation.fr: C'est quoi, ton rêve le plus bizarre ?

translation.en: I don't remember my dreams.
translation.fr: Je ne me rappelle jamais mes rêves.

translation.en: Don't actually think I have any.
translation.fr: Je crois que je n'en fais pas.

translation.en: I brought you some milk, right?
Are you, uh, excited for your first day of school?
translation.fr:
Tu es impatiente
pour ton premier jour d'école ?

translation.en: School?
[Uncle] This place should be amazing. It costs a fortune.
translation.fr:
C'est censé être le top, ici.
Ça coûte une fortune.

translation.en: My dad said schools are basically prisons.
translation.fr: Pour papa, l'école était une prison.

translation.en: They keep kids locked up physically and mentally,
translation.fr:
Elle enferme les enfants
physiquement et mentalement,

translation.en: prepare them for jobs that are also basically prisons, until they retire and go to a nursing home.
translation.fr:
elle forme à des boulots prisons
et on finit en maison de retraite.

translation.en: Their final prison.
School is not a prison.
Can I leave whenever I want to?
translation.fr: Je peux partir quand je veux ?

translation.en: It's a little like a prison.
Bell doesn't help.
Nemo, hi. Welcome to Westbrook.
-I am Ms. Arya, lower school counselor. -Hey. Hi.
translation.fr: Je suis Mlle Arya, conseillère scolaire.

translation.en: Well, I know what a… a difficult time this is but, um… Hey, do you know what the most resilient thing on earth is?
translation.fr:
Je sais que c'est un moment difficile,
mais rien n'est plus résistant que…

translation.en: It's not titanium.
Is it tungsten? It has a higher tensile strength--
translation.fr:
Le tungstène ?
Sa résistance à la traction…

translation.en: The human spirit.
Oh, you mean metaphorically.
What you're going through, it's hard. But you know what?
translation.fr: C'est dur, ce que tu traverses.

translation.en: You are stronger than you know.
translation.fr: Tu es plus forte que tu le crois.

translation.en: Hey, can we talk for a sec?
-Oh, yeah. -Just one sec. Uh…
I, uh, just wanted to prepare you.
[quietly] Nemo's dad kinda raised her like a hermit.
translation.fr: Le père de Nemo l'a élevée en ermite.

translation.en: Not in a bad way, just… you have your work cut out for you.
translation.fr:
Pas mal élevée,
mais vous avez du pain sur la planche.

translation.en: She… She's gonna need a lot of emotional support.
translation.fr: Elle va avoir besoin de soutien affectif.

translation.en: Yeah. I mean, I'm hoping that you guys can help with all that.
translation.fr:
Oui. J'espère
que vous pourrez lui donner tout ça.

translation.en: Oh. Well, we can't do that all by ourselves.
translation.fr: On ne peut pas tout faire tout seuls.

translation.en: -No. -[both chuckle]
-Right? -Right. Obviously.
translation.fr:
- Non.
- N'est-ce pas ? Non, bien sûr. Vous ne faites pas ça ?

translation.en: Is that not something you do?
translation.fr: Non, bien sûr. Vous ne faites pas ça ?

translation.en: Look, I don't know how to take care of a little kid or talk about feelings.
translation.fr:
Je ne sais pas m'occuper d'un enfant,
ni parler de sentiments.

translation.en: Now, I think that she would be better off literally anywhere else.
translation.fr:
Je pense qu'elle serait mieux
n'importe où ailleurs.

translation.en: Oh, you have my hands.
You are capable of more than you think.
-[chuckles] Truly. You just gotta… -[chuckles lightly]
You just gotta connect with a part of yourself that you're not used to accessing.
translation.fr:
de puiser dans un recoin de vous
auquel vous faites peu appel.

translation.en: You just gotta connect with her.
-Just try. -Okay.
-[door opens] -Hi, everyone. Hi. [quietly] Thanks, Ms. Young.
translation.fr: Bonjour à tous ! Merci, Mme Young.

translation.en: Hi, guys. How's everybody doing?
translation.fr: Bonjour, les enfants, vous allez bien ?

translation.en: This is Nemo. She's gonna be joining your class.
translation.fr:
Je vous présente Nemo,
elle va intégrer votre classe.

translation.en: So if you could all just make her feel right at home,
translation.fr:
Je vous demande
de lui faire un bon accueil.

translation.en: I would be so grateful.
Sorry.
Okay, everyone. Listen up.
In a victory for planet Earth,
we got compostable utensils in the cafeteria.
translation.fr:
on a des couverts compostables
à la cantine.

translation.en: We won!
Hmm. Uh, Nemo, Jamal.
-Jamal, Nemo. -[Jamal] It's a seven-day cycle.
translation.fr: Nemo, Jamal. Jamal, Nemo. Ça marche par semaine.

translation.en: You're late, you get a blue dot.
translation.fr: À chaque retard, tu as un point bleu.

translation.en: Three blues, and you get a red dot, and your parents get a notification.
translation.fr:
Trois bleus, ça fait un rouge,
tes parents reçoivent un message.

translation.en: And you can get the app for your phone.
translation.fr: Il y a une appli mobile.

translation.en: I don't have a phone.
That is refreshing.
You're gonna need the app, though.
Any clubs you're into?
I'm on recycling team, Model UN, ceramics club, Pop-Tarts, that's our improv group,
translation.fr:
Moi, aux clubs recyclage,
diplomatie, céramique, théâtre d'impro,

translation.en: lawn bowling, Slavic chorus, orchestra, woodworking, ultimate Frisbee…
translation.fr:
boulingrin, chœur russe,
fanfare, menuiserie, frisbee…

translation.en: Where'd you go to school before this?
I didn't. I was homeschooled. Um, my dad and I lived in a lighthouse.
translation.fr:
Aucune, mon père me faisait l'école.
On habitait dans un phare.

translation.en: A lighthouse? That sounds awesome.
translation.fr: Un phare ? Ça doit être génial.

translation.en: Why'd you move here?
My…
My dad's on a trip. That's why I'm here. I'm staying with my uncle, just temporarily.
translation.fr:
Mon père est en voyage, c'est pour ça.
Je suis hébergée par mon oncle.

translation.en: Oh. Cool.
Those are my Undeadheads.
We dress up as zombies and watch zombie movies.
translation.fr: On mate des films de zombies, déguisés.

translation.en: It's cooler than it sounds… I think.
translation.fr: C'est plus cool qu'on croit. Je crois.

translation.en: Uh, come sit with us.
Um, I… I need to do my math.
I have a great activity we can do together.
translation.fr:
J'ai une super idée d'activité
à faire ensemble.

translation.en: Lockpicks. Probably from some master thief.
translation.fr:
Des picks pour serrures,
ayant appartenu à un grand cambrioleur.

translation.en: Or maybe just a retiring locksmith.
translation.fr: Ou à un serrurier à la retraite.

translation.en: That cool?
I first learned to do this when I was about your age.
translation.fr:
J'ai commencé à apprendre
quand j'avais ton âge.

translation.en: I was the first kid in school interested in door hardware.
translation.fr:
J'ai été le premier de mon école
à m'intéresser aux mécanismes de porte.

translation.en: [Uncle] Now, the trick… is to move both slowly.
Feel for the catch.
Before you know it…
Houdini who? Houdini me. That's Houdini who.
That's a little… mantra. You don't have to say that.
translation.fr:
C'est ma formule magique,
tu n'es pas obligée de la dire.

translation.en: Wanna have a go?
I'm a little doorknobbed out.
translation.fr: J'ai eu ma dose de poignées.

translation.en: That's fine. We can, um… [clicks tongue] We'll do something else. We'll, uh…
translation.fr: C'est pas grave, on va faire autre chose.

translation.en: play soccer.
We could play soccer. Wanna… uh, build a pillow fort?
translation.fr:
On pourrait jouer au foot.
Ou faire un château de coussins ?

translation.en: Are you reading a list off your phone?
translation.fr: Tu lis une liste sur ton portable ?

translation.en: -Yes. Yes, I am. -[phone locks]
I'm gonna just…
Oh, sure. Totally.
Pig?
Pig, what are you doing?
[Nemo] Oh my gosh, Pig.
You found it.
Come on, Pig. Let's go find Dad.
Boring book, boring book, boring…
See ya.
Um, I have to check my schedule. Can I see your phone?
translation.fr:
Je peux voir mon emploi du temps
sur ton téléphone ?

translation.en: [Uncle] Look at you, using apps. See what happens when you try?
translation.fr:
Ça y est, tu utilises les applis !
Tu vois, on y prend goût.

translation.en: [Nemo] Yup, just learnin' new stuff all the time.
translation.fr: ABSENCE DE 2 SEMAINES J'apprends tous les jours.

translation.en: [Nemo] Oh, Flip.
Come on, Pig.
[echoing] Flip?
Flip?
-[Nemo] Flip! -[tool clatters]
[Flip] You. I found the map.
I knew I liked you. [chuckles]
translation.fr: Je savais que je t'aimais bien.

translation.en: -You tried to kill me. -I was trying to wake you up.
translation.fr:
Tu as essayé de me tuer. J'essayais de te réveiller.
On ne meurt pas en rêve.

translation.en: Everybody knows you can't die in your dreams.
translation.fr:
J'essayais de te réveiller.
On ne meurt pas en rêve.

translation.en: You told me about this in my dream, and then I find it in the Waking World.
translation.fr:
Tu m'as parlé de ça en rêve, et je l'ai trouvé dans le monde réel,
comment ça se fait ?

translation.en: How is that possible?
translation.fr:
et je l'ai trouvé dans le monde réel,
comment ça se fait ?

translation.en: [clicks tongue] Maybe the real world's bigger than you thought.
translation.fr:
Le monde réel est plus vaste
que tu pensais.

translation.en: [Nemo] Hey! It's my map. You can't just take it.
translation.fr: C'est ma carte, tu peux pas la prendre !

translation.en: Yeah, well, I hate to break it to you, kid. Taking people's stuff's kind of my thing.
translation.fr:
Je vais te dévoiler un scoop :
prendre aux autres, c'est mon truc.

translation.en: -[Flip gasps] -You said I could see my dad again. I'm coming with you.
translation.fr:
Tu as dit que je pourrais
revoir mon père. Je viens aussi.

translation.en: Listen, that's real sweet and all, and I miss your dad too, but you're not comin'! Go away.
translation.fr:
C'est mimi, et ton père me manque aussi,
mais tu viens pas ! Va-t'en.

translation.en: What was that?
Double-Knock.
He told you about the Double-Knock?
translation.fr: Il t'a parlé du double toc ?

translation.en: You have to take me. Outlaw Code.
Oh, don't tell me about the Outlaw Code. I'm one of the cocreators of the Outlaw Code.
translation.fr:
Ne me parle pas du code des hors-la-loi,
j'ai contribué à le créer.

translation.en: Before me, it was just one knock.
translation.fr: Avant moi, c'était un seul toc.

translation.en: This isn't some Girl Scout trip to Lollipop Land, okay?
translation.fr:
C'est pas un voyage de jeannettes
au pays des sucettes.

translation.en: We're gonna have to travel through people's dreams to get to that treasure.
translation.fr:
On doit traverser les rêves des autres
pour trouver le trésor.

translation.en: So you get killed, it's on you.
translation.fr: Si tu te fais tuer, c'est ton problème.

translation.en: You said you can't die in a dream.
translation.fr: Mais on peut pas mourir en rêve.

translation.en: I said you can't die in your dream. You die in your dream, you wake up.
translation.fr: Pas dans ton propre rêve, tu te réveilles.

translation.en: You die in someone else's dream, you don't wake up. Ever.
translation.fr:
Mais dans un autre rêve,
tu te réveilles pas.

translation.en: I don't care. I'm coming.
Fine.
You slow me down, you screw things up, this map is mine, and you're on your own.
translation.fr:
Si tu me ralentis, si tu te plantes,
la carte est à moi, et tu te débrouilles.

translation.en: -Deal. -Let me see your gear.
translation.fr:
- Marché conclu.
- Fais voir ton matériel.

translation.en: [under breath] Double-Knock.
What is this? Extraordinary Knobs.
translation.fr:
C'est quoi, ça ?
Passionnantes poignées de porte.

translation.en: It's my Uncle Philip's. He's a doorknob salesman.
translation.fr:
Mon oncle Philip
vend des poignées de porte.

translation.en: He has no friends, no life, and he makes me go to school.
translation.fr:
Il a pas d'amis, pas de vie,
et il me fait aller à l'école.

translation.en: What a monster.
Well, this'll put you to sleep faster than any sleeping pill.
translation.fr:
Ça te fera dormir plus vite
que tous les cachets.

translation.en: Okay, here. You hold on to this when you fall asleep.
translation.fr:
Tiens, prends ça dans ta main
quand tu t'endormiras.

translation.en: That way, you can find me when we're on the road. Okay?
translation.fr:
Comme ça,
tu me retrouveras sur le chemin.

translation.en: -[Pig burps] -What the heck is that?
[Nemo] He's a pig, and his name is Pig.
translation.fr: Un cochon, il s'appelle M'sieur Cochon.

translation.en: Super creative. Fine. Bring him. I love bacon.
translation.fr: Très inventif. Amène-le, j'adore le bacon.

translation.en: All right. Look at this.
The World of Dreams.
This is a map of every dream in the world. Slumberland.
translation.fr:
Ceci est une carte
de tous les rêves du monde.

translation.en: Your dad and I used this map to go on all our adventures back in the day,
translation.fr:
Elle nous servait à ton père et moi,
dans toutes nos aventures,

translation.en: jumpin' from dream to dream, to wherever we wanted to go.
translation.fr:
pour sauter de rêve en rêve
et aller où on voulait.

translation.en: We swiped this map from a dream cop at the Bureau.
translation.fr:
On l'avait volée
à une flic des rêves du Bureau.

translation.en: She's been chasing me ever since.
The Bureau?
Bureau of Subconscious Activities, BOSA.
translation.fr:
Le Bureau des activités subconscientes,
le BASC.

translation.en: Unfortunately for us, they're the bozos that decide what you get to dream.
translation.fr:
Malheureusement,
ces guignols décident de nos rêves.

translation.en: Unless you end up here.
-The Sea of Nightmares. -[thunder crashing]
Sea of Nightmares. My dad told me about that.
translation.fr:
La Mer des cauchemars,
mon père m'en a parlé.

translation.en: That's where the Pearls are.
translation.fr: C'est là que sont les perles.

translation.en: [Flip] Greatest treasure in the world.
translation.fr: Le plus beau trésor du monde.

translation.en: The sticky part is those dream cops at the Bureau don't want us to know they even exist.
translation.fr:
Mais la police des rêves ne veut pas
qu'on connaisse leur existence.

translation.en: Because you get your hands on one of those bad boys,
translation.fr:
Parce que si on met la main
sur ces perles,

translation.en: and you can wish for whatever you want here in Slumberland.
translation.fr:
on a n'importe quel vœu exaucé
dans le Monde des rêves,

translation.en: And it's out of their control.
I could see my dad again?
If you don't die. Which you probably will.
translation.fr:
Si tu meurs pas,
mais ça risque d'arriver.

translation.en: Oh my God. Your dad would kill me if he knew I was doing this.
translation.fr: Ton père me tuerait s'il me voyait faire.

translation.en: All right, listen, we're looking for reoccurring dreams.
translation.fr: Bon, on cherche des rêves récurrents,

translation.en: That way, we can get out the same way that we got in.
translation.fr:
pour pouvoir en sortir
comme on y est entrés.

translation.en: Where's the door? What door?
translation.fr:
- Où est la porte ?
- Quelle porte ?

translation.en: [sighs] The Bureau puts in secret doors to connect the dreams.
translation.fr:
Le Bureau pose des portes secrètes
entre les rêves.

translation.en: Civilians aren't supposed to know, unless you're a genius like myself.
translation.fr:
On n'est pas censés les connaître,
sauf les génies comme moi.

translation.en: [martial arts shout] Look out!
Okay, that was definitely not here before.
translation.fr: Ça, c'était pas là avant, c'est sûr.

translation.en: All right, we go through this door, everything changes.
translation.fr:
Quand on aura passé cette porte,
tout va changer.

translation.en: You slip up, you're dead. You'll never see the Waking World again.
translation.fr:
Au moindre faux pas, t'es morte.
Tu reverras jamais le monde réel.

translation.en: What are we waiting for?
That's the spirit.
All right. Welcome to my world, kid.
translation.fr:
Voilà !
Bienvenue dans mon univers, petite.

translation.en: Brand-new dream, still under construction.
translation.fr: Un tout nouveau rêve, encore en chantier.

translation.en: Elegante. Spanish for "I look good."
I'm a flippin' outlaw, so I don't play by the rules. But here's the rules.
translation.fr:
Étant hors-la-loi, je suis aucune règle.
Mais voilà les règles.

translation.en: Rule number one, keep a low profile.
We don't wanna get caught messin' around in other people's dreams, trust me.
translation.fr:
Te fais pas choper
à saccager les rêves des autres.

translation.en: -If the dream pigs catch you, they will-- -[Pig grunts]
translation.fr: Si ces cochons de flics t'attrapent…

translation.en: Oh. My bad, buddy.
If the dream cops catch you, they will lock you up and throw away the key.
translation.fr:
Si les flics des rêves te chopent,
ils t'enferment à double tour.

translation.en: Doomed to rot in a dingy Bureau prison cell
translation.fr:
Tu moisiras dans une cellule du Bureau
pour l'éternité,

translation.en: for all of eternity till you cease to exist entirely.
translation.fr:
Tu moisiras dans une cellule du Bureau
pour l'éternité, jusqu'à ce que tu cesses d'exister.

translation.en: So blend in.
Yeah, 'cause you totally blend in.
Rule number two, stay focused.
[whistles] We're not here to have fun, okay?
translation.fr: On n'est pas là pour s'amuser.

translation.en: We get in, we find the next door, then we get out.
translation.fr:
On entre,
on trouve la porte d'après, on sort.

translation.en: Onto the next dream. Our one and only mission is finding those Pearls.
translation.fr:
Rêve suivant. Notre seule mission
est de trouver ces perles.

translation.en: Rule number three. We're not friends. We're not partners.
translation.fr:
Troisième règle,
on n'est ni amis ni associés.

translation.en: I am the boss. El Jefe, 'kay? We do as I say, you got it?
translation.fr:
Je suis ton chef. El Jefe.
On fait comme je dis, pigé ?

translation.en: So rule number three's just a bunch of aggressive statements?
translation.fr:
La troisième règle,
c'est juste un déballage agressif ?

translation.en: Nobody likes a smart aleck, kid.
-[in Spanish] Excuse me. -[Flip] Hey, buddy. What's up?
Are you sure you're in the right dream?
translation.fr: Vous êtes sûr d'être dans le bon rêve ?

translation.en: I don't see you on my list.
translation.fr: Vous n'êtes pas sur ma liste.

translation.en: The girl represents long-lost childhood.
I'm a troubling mix of a father figure
translation.fr:
Moi, je suis un mélange dérangeant de figure paternelle
et de virilité brute.

translation.en: and raw, masculine power.
translation.fr:
de figure paternelle
et de virilité brute.

translation.en: And… what is this?
Brother…
[in English, with Spanish accent] …sometimes a pig is just a pig.
translation.fr:
Quelquefois,
un cochon est juste un cochon.

translation.en: Silly puerco.
[in Spanish] Library.
[clears throat] Perdón.
Do you party?
No, I don't.
You party. I party.
translation.fr: Tu aimes faire la fête. Moi aussi.

translation.en: [in English] What was that?
I don't know Spanish. That's the only word I know.
translation.fr: Je sais rien dire d'autre en espagnol.

translation.en: Leave it to the pros. That's me. That's professional.
translation.fr:
Laisse faire les pros.
Comme moi. Professionnel.

translation.en: Ooh, it's all about the Miss D, misdirection. Did you know that? Boop!
translation.fr: Tout est dans la diversion, tu le savais ?

translation.en: I don't even know if this is real. Oh, that's real.
Now we're talkin'. [laughs]
Who wants the Waking World when you got all this, huh?
translation.fr:
Qui veut revenir au monde réel
quand on a tout ça ?

translation.en: [Green] Oi! Agent Green.
translation.fr:
Agent Green,
Bureau des activités subconscientes.

translation.en: Bureau of Subconscious Activities. This the thieving punk you rang about?
translation.fr:
Agent Green,
Bureau des activités subconscientes. C'est lui, le voleur que vous avez vu ?

translation.en: [Green] Cheers, mate.
Our next door
is behind the stage, yeah. [chuckles]
[band leader, in Spanish] And now, the Salsa Queen of Old Havana!
translation.fr: Et maintenant… la reine de la salsa de La Havane !

translation.en: [in English] There's our dreamer.
-[laughs] Classic repression dream. -[Nemo] What's that?
Well, you never heard of Freud? [in singsong] Repression.
translation.fr:
Tu as jamais entendu parler
du refoulement ?

translation.en: All those feelings get bottled up, and they go busting out in Slumberland.
translation.fr: Des émotions qui sont enfouies et qui explosent dans le Monde des rêves.

translation.en: I guarantee she's nothin' like that in the Waking World. Believe me.
translation.fr:
Elle est pas du tout comme ça
dans le monde réel, crois-moi.

translation.en: [in Spanish accent] You see me? Yes.
[in Spanish] Mm! What is that scent?
[in English] It's au naturel. By Flip.
[sighs, in Spanish] Such raw, masculine power.
Gracias.
But at the same time… a deep sadness.
translation.fr:
Mais en même temps,
une profonde tristesse.

translation.en: Like a lost little boy, far from home.
translation.fr:
Perdu comme un petit garçon
loin de chez lui.

translation.en: [sighs] Dance with me.
[in English] Hey! You said we weren't here to have fun.
translation.fr:
Tu disais
qu'on n'était pas là pour s'amuser.

translation.en: I said you're not here to have fun. I'm an outlaw.
translation.fr:
Toi, t'es pas là pour t'amuser.
Moi, je suis hors-la-loi.

translation.en: If I'm not havin' fun, I'm doin' my job wrong. -Know what I'm sayin'? -Hmm.
translation.fr:
Si je m'amuse pas,
je fais mal mon boulot. Tu me suis ?

translation.en: [in Spanish] Who's she?
Go away, Nemo. You'll ruin the nice lady's dream. -Buh-bye. -[Nemo grunts]
translation.fr:
Fiche le camp, Nemo.
Tu vas gâcher le rêve de la gentille dame.

translation.en: -[wings flapping loudly] -Flip!
-[music grows sinister] -[Nemo] What about the Pearls?
[Nemo, whimpering] Flip!
[panting] Flip? Please!
[Flip] What the Flip?
That's no bueno.
Adiós. Let's get to that door, fast.
Hello, Flip. Where's that map?
translation.fr: Bonjour, Flip. Où est cette carte ?

translation.en: [snarls] Green.
I've been waiting for this for a long time.
The dream cop.
You're under a--
[shakily] What… the…?
"What the…?" [chuckles]
[Flip] Nightmare!
Look out!
[grunting and straining] Oh my God!
Ew, yucky!
-[music fades] -[Flip] Holy moly.
It took years for me to shake that cop off my tuchus.
translation.fr:
Ça a pris des années pour que cette flic
arrête de me coller au train.

translation.en: First dream out with you, I get her and a nightmare?
translation.fr:
Au premier rêve avec toi,
je me coltine elle et un cauchemar ?

translation.en: You're like a bad luck charm.
And I don't get it. That nightmare flew right past the dreamer.
translation.fr:
Je comprends pas, le cauchemar
est passé à côté de la rêveuse.

translation.en: [sighs] Why the heck was it coming after us?
I've seen it before.
The night my dad died.
translation.fr: La nuit de la mort de mon père.

translation.en: It's yours. It's your nightmare.
translation.fr: C'est le tien, c'est ton cauchemar.

translation.en: What?
You brought the nightmare. Nightmares smell fear.
translation.fr:
C'est toi qui l'as attiré.
Ils sentent la peur.

translation.en: It's tracking you, and nightmares won't stop until they get you.
translation.fr:
Il te poursuivra
jusqu'à ce qu'il te chope.

translation.en: [panting] Do you ruin every party you go to? I've never even been to a party.
translation.fr:
- Tu gâches toujours les fêtes ?
- Je suis jamais allée à une fête.

translation.en: I never should've brought you. Give me the map back.
translation.fr:
J'aurais pas dû t'emmener.
Rends-moi la carte.

translation.en: No. I did the Double-Knock.
translation.fr: Non, j'ai fait un double toc.

translation.en: Give it to me!
[Flip] What is that?
No, no, no. Don't-- Don't wake up! Don't wake up!
No, give me… give me the map!
-Hey. -Uh, what are you doing here?
translation.fr:
- Salut.
- Qu'est-ce que tu fais là ?

translation.en: Checking my mushrooms.
Mushroom club. It's a… one-person club.
translation.fr:
Le club champignons.
Il y a qu'un seul membre.

translation.en: Are you hiding out down here?
No.
'Cause I mean, you weren't in class, and this looks a little bit like a secret hideout, so…
translation.fr:
T'étais pas en cours,
et ici, ça fait un peu planque secrète.

translation.en: School thinks I'm on a trip, and my uncle thinks I'm at school.
translation.fr:
L'école me croit en voyage
et mon oncle me croit à l'école.

translation.en: Hardcore.
Uh, you won't tell anybody I'm here, though, right?
translation.fr: Tu dis rien à personne, hein ?

translation.en: Omertà, the vow of silence.
You can try some of my mushrooms.
translation.fr:
Tu peux goûter de mes champignons,
en les frottant avant.

translation.en: Just brush 'em off first. It's manure.
translation.fr:
Tu peux goûter de mes champignons,
en les frottant avant. C'est du fumier, pas mon caca,
donc c'est pas immonde.

translation.en: It's not my poop, so it isn't weird or anything.
translation.fr:
C'est du fumier, pas mon caca,
donc c'est pas immonde.

translation.en: Bye.
See ya. [sighs]
Hey… [sighs]
…squirt. [chuckles]
Can I take the… I wanna show you something really cool.
translation.fr: J'ai quelque chose de cool à te montrer.

translation.en: You ready?
And… surprise.
I arranged with Carla to get it here,
translation.fr: Je l'ai fait envoyer par Carla.

translation.en: and I figured maybe this Saturday we could go sailing.
translation.fr: Samedi, on pourrait aller faire du bateau.

translation.en: I mean, you could go sailing.
I'm strictly a dry-land guy due to my sensitive bowels.
translation.fr: Moi, je reste sur le plancher des vaches, à cause de mes intestins sensibles.

translation.en: You should sell it or something.
I don't think I wanna sail anymore.
translation.fr: J'ai plus trop envie d'en faire.

translation.en: [Philip] Nemo, I know this is hard.
translation.fr: Nemo, je sais que c'est dur.

translation.en: And different and scary.
But I think it would be a mistake if you shut yourself off from the world,
translation.fr:
Mais ce serait une erreur
de t'isoler du monde,

translation.en: like your dad did.
What are you talking about?
Your dad was… different before.
And then, when your mom died--
translation.fr: Et à la mort de ta mère…

translation.en: My dad wasn't shut off.
[scoffs] Nemo, he moved to an island.
translation.fr: Il a déménagé sur une île.

translation.en: Do you ever go anywhere or do anything?
translation.fr:
Ça t'arrive de sortir,
de faire des choses ?

translation.en: Do you have any actual friends? Doorknobs don't count.
translation.fr:
T'as des amis ?
Sans compter les poignées de porte.

translation.en: [scoffs] I'm just saying, don't be afraid to… I don't know, have fun again.
translation.fr:
Je te dis juste de ne pas avoir peur
de t'amuser à nouveau.

translation.en: I'm not afraid of anything.
-I'm gonna go to bed. -[mouthing] What?
It's like 5:30.
I know you wanna sleep all the time because you're sad.
translation.fr:
Tu as envie de dormir tout le temps,
c'est la tristesse.

translation.en: I know that feeling.
But life is what happens when you're awake. Not mine!
translation.fr:
- Mais on ne vit qu'en étant éveillé.
- Pas moi !

translation.en: [whining] Go to sleep. Go to sleep. Go to sleep.
-Damn it. This is interesting! -[book thuds]
You okay?
I just wanna sleep.
Maybe if you tried putting on some pajamas.
translation.fr:
Si tu essayais
de te mettre en pyjama ?

translation.en: This is what I wear to bed.
translation.fr: C'est ça, ma tenue pour dormir.

translation.en: Okay, well, what did your dad do to help you get to sleep?
translation.fr:
Qu'est-ce que ton père faisait
pour t'aider à t'endormir ?

translation.en: Sometimes… he'd tell me stories.
translation.fr:
Quelquefois,
il me racontait des histoires.

translation.en: Aren't you a little old for that?
translation.fr: Tu n'es pas un peu grande ?

translation.en: -Never mind. -[Philip] No, it's fine.
translation.fr: Laisse tomber. Non, ça va, je peux essayer

translation.en: I can try to make up a story.
translation.fr: Non, ça va, je peux essayer de t'inventer une histoire.

translation.en: Okay. Sorry, I didn't realize you were gonna be watching me. That's… That's fine.
translation.fr:
Pardon, je n'ai pas pensé
que tu me regarderais. Mais ça va.

translation.en: This is a story based on a true story
about a man…
on Christmas Eve…
translation.fr: Le soir du réveillon de Noël.

translation.en: I think.

que tu arrêteras de t'accrocher

J'avais le cœur brisé.
Je n'ai pas dormi pendant trois nuits.

translation.en: And after that, no more Flip.
I was just Philip.
Your dad would call from time to time to check in,
translation.fr: Ton papa m'appelait de temps en temps,

translation.en: and he'd tell me about all his crazy adventures.
translation.fr: il me parlait de ses folles aventures.

translation.en: And he'd ask me what I was doin', and…
translation.fr: Quand il me demandait de mes nouvelles,

translation.en: I'd have to tell him all about my boring life.
translation.fr:
je n'avais que ma vie barbante
à raconter.

translation.en: [shakily] So after a while, I just…
let him go to voice mail.
Anyway… ancient history now.
I moved on. I'm sure he did too.
translation.fr: J'ai tourné la page. Lui aussi, sûrement.

translation.en: I have to go back.
I mean, I have to get ready for school.
Uh, ready? What? It's like 5:00 a.m.
translation.fr: Te préparer ? Il est 5 h du matin.

translation.en: I've got a lot to do.
translation.fr: J'ai plein de choses à faire.

translation.en: Can I borrow your lockpicks… for school?
translation.fr:
Je peux t'emprunter tes picks,
pour l'école ?

translation.en: Go ahead. Take 'em.
My dad didn't move on.
translation.fr: Papa n'a pas tourné la page.

translation.en: He told stories about you every night.
translation.fr: Il parlait de toi tous les soirs.

translation.en: Nemo. Hey.
I gotta go.
I heard Davenport and Arya talking about her.
translation.fr:
J'ai entendu Davenport et Arya
parler d'elle.

translation.en: You know why she moved here, right? Her dad died.
translation.fr:
Vous savez pourquoi elle est venue ici ?
Son père est mort.

translation.en: -[wings fluttering] -Excuse me. Sorry. Sorry.
-[truck door slams] -[Nemo panting] Hey, kid.
-I'm driving my truck. -[Pig oinks]
-I know. -[hatch squeaks]
You, out.
-Long-lost childhood. -[Pig snorts]
[in adult's voice] Babies.
Obviously.
-[elevator rattles, bell dings] -Oh, well. [chuckles]
Time to make the doughnuts.
-[baby] Have a nice day. -[Pig snorts]
[quietly] You came back for me.
You gotta come for your partner, even if he's a pain in the--
translation.fr:
On revient toujours pour son associé,
même s'il est…

translation.en: -Applesauce! -Tie this while I get you outta here.
translation.fr:
- Charmant !
- Mets ça autour de ton doigt.

translation.en: Oh, I know. [laughs]
Pickin' locks?
-I knew you were an outlaw. -[lock clangs] Houdini who? Houdini me. That's Houdini who. [giggles]
translation.fr:
- Je savais que t'étais hors-la-loi.
- C'est qui, Houdini ? C'est bibi !

translation.en: -Whoa, check this out. -What do we got here?
translation.fr: Regardez-moi ça. Qu'est-ce qu'on a là ?

translation.en: [in Brooklyn accent] Say, uh, I'm from juvie, and this guy was stealin' from us.
translation.fr:
Je viens de la maison de redressement.
Ce mec nous piquait des trucs.

translation.en: [scoffs] Toys, candies, puppy dogs.
translation.fr: Des jouets, des bonbons, des chiots.

translation.en: Yeah, you got nothin' on me, kid. [growls]
-You like wreckin' kids' dreams, scumbag? -[Flip whimpering]
translation.fr:
T'aimes gâcher les rêves des gosses,
ordure ?

translation.en: You like tearin' the heads off of teddy bears, huh? Huh? Huh?
translation.fr: Et arracher la tête des ours en peluche ?

translation.en: -[Flip groans] -How 'bout I tear your head off?
translation.fr: Et si moi, je t'arrachais la tête ?

translation.en: [crying] Guys, take me away. She's so mean.
Juvie, man. They do not mess around.
translation.fr:
Ça rigole pas,
à la maison de redressement.

translation.en: Yo, I gotta bail.
-Right. -Okay, see you after lunch.
translation.fr:
- OK.
- On se voit après le déj.

translation.en: [Flip] Is this really necessary?
-[Flip] Well, that's awkward. -[sighs] You must be having a laugh, mate.
translation.fr: Moment gênant. Non mais je rêve…

translation.en: Let's see how tough you are without that thingamabobber.
translation.fr:
Voyons si vous êtes habile
sans ce machin-chose.

translation.en: Okay. Want some of this, do ya?
-Yeah? Ready for it? -[Flip] Yeah!
Oh, man. [whines, panting]
You're so tough for a 160-year-old lady.
You're under a--
It's all about misdirection.
You're gonna make me really regret being so nice to you. [gasps]
translation.fr:
Tu vas me faire regretter
d'avoir été gentille avec toi.

translation.en: Yes. Excuse me, Cindy. -[Nemo] Excuse me. Excuse me. -Pardon me. Uh…
How's this gonna work? Oh, boy.
-There ya go. Ah, okay. -[Nemo] Ow.
Here we go.
-And you. -[elevator bell dings]
-Hey, here. -[Nemo] Oh.
-Get a "momento." -[Nemo] Ah.
-Yeah, right. -[Nemo] Say cheese.
Fromage!
-Perfect. -[Flip gasps]
-[elevator bell dings] -Sorry. Sorry.
-[Flip] Sorry, not sorry. -[Nemo laughs]
All right. Okay, hey, look.
This elevator's gonna take us right where we wanna go.
translation.fr:
Cet ascenseur
va nous emmener où on veut.

translation.en: The last stop before the Sea of Nightmares.
translation.fr: Juste avant la Mer des cauchemars.

translation.en: [laughing] We're gonna get our Pearls.
Yeah, about that. I have to tell you something.
translation.fr: À propos, il faut que je te dise…

translation.en: Okay, well, just wait a second.
[snickers] Classic, right?
[chuckles] Yeah. There are no Pearls.
translation.fr: Oui. Il n'y a pas de perles.

translation.en: [sighs, chuckling slightly] What're you talking about?
It's a myth. Agent Green told me.
translation.fr: C'est une légende, dit l'agent Green.

translation.en: And you believed her? [scoffs]
She was just tryin' to keep you in your place. It ain't no myth, believe me.
translation.fr:
Elle dit ça pour que tu restes où tu es.
C'est pas une légende, crois-moi.

translation.en: -How do you know? -'Cause your dad saw them.
translation.fr: Qu'est-ce que t'en sais ? Ton père les a vues.

translation.en: We were there. Sea of Nightmares?
translation.fr: On y est allés, à la Mer des cauchemars.

translation.en: Yeah, he went all the way down the whirlpool. All the way to the bottom.
translation.fr:
Il est descendu dans le tourbillon,
jusqu'au fond.

translation.en: And then he saw the Pearls, thousands of 'em.
translation.fr: Là, il a vu des perles, par milliers.

translation.en: Your dad had the greatest imagination… but he would never lie.
translation.fr:
Il avait une imagination débordante,
mais il ne mentait pas.

translation.en: We can't go back.
translation.fr: On ne peut plus y retourner.

translation.en: We're not goin' back. [chuckles]
translation.fr: On ne prend pas le même chemin.

translation.en: [Flip] C'mon, kid.
-[both panting] -Ooh, it's bright.
-[Pig squealing] -Much better.
Okay, here we go.
Pig!
Come on, kid!
The final door's gotta be out here somewhere.
translation.fr: La dernière porte est forcément par là.

translation.en: Keep goin'! Go! Go!
[Nemo] So, what do we do now?
[in Canadian accent] Whoa! Oh, hey there! How about this view, eh?
translation.fr: Salut ! Visez un peu cette vue !

translation.en: -Canada? -Like I said, number-one dream.
translation.fr: Un Canadien ? Comme je disais, rêve numéro un.

translation.en: Go away! [grunts]
Eat this, Green!
-Come on, Flip! -What're you doin'?
-[Nemo] The geese! -[Flip] Oh, but you're crazy!
[laughs] You think that's a thing of beaut?
Well, let me tell ya, there's a Timmies.
That's a Tim Horton's for ya. Pert near 20 clicks that way--
translation.fr:
un Tim Horton's,
à pas 20 kilomètres d'ici.

translation.en: -Hey, buddy. -[Canadian] Oh, yeah, eh?
I wanna swipe your gooser here, eh?
translation.fr: J'ai envie de te piquer ton oie.

translation.en: Uh, yeah. Sure, bud. Scooch my goose.
translation.fr: Vas-y, mon gars. Mon oie est à toi.

translation.en: [laughing] Keep your stick on the ice!
-Ooh. Right down there. -[goose honks]
Oh, man.
-Hey, Bob? -[giant goose honks]
-[Flip] That was awesome. -[loud honk]
-[Flip imitates honk, sighs] -Bye, Bob.
I think you and I should be partners. What do you think?
translation.fr: On devrait être associés, ça te dit ?

translation.en: Look, there's something I need to tell you.
translation.fr: Il faut que je te dise quelque chose.

translation.en: There it is! I found it before you!
-[laughing] -[Nemo] Race ya! Last one there is a rotten dream!
translation.fr:
On fait la course !
Le dernier a un gage !

translation.en: -[energetic orchestral music playing] -Wait, wait, wait. -Be cool. Be cool. Be cool. -[Pig snorts]
[quietly] It's the final door.
And it's open.
-Which is a first. -[whispering] Why are you being quiet?
translation.fr:
- C'est une première.
- Pourquoi tu parles tout bas ?

translation.en: -[Flip] 'Cause it's scary. -[Nemo] And dark.
-[Flip] Yeah, and dark. -[Nemo] And creepy.
I was just makin' sure no one's in there.
translation.fr: Je vérifie qu'il y a personne.

translation.en: Well, you know, it's the gateway to the Sea of Nightmares, so… [chuckles]
translation.fr: C'est l'entrée de la Mer des cauchemars.

translation.en: Pearls are in here somewhere. All right.
Ready?
-[Nemo takes a deep breath] -Here we go, partner.
-I don't wanna go first. -It's okay.
translation.fr:
- Je veux pas être devant.
- Va.

translation.en: -But I'm scared. -[Flip] It's an initiation, so…
translation.fr:
- J'ai peur.
- C'est un voyage initiatique.

translation.en: It's cold.
[Flip] That's a whole lot of water.
Gonna go for a little swim. No big deal.
translation.fr: On va piquer une tête, tranquille.

translation.en: I know who you are.
I found out in the Waking World.
translation.fr: Je t'ai trouvé dans le monde réel.

translation.en: Why the hell didn't you tell me?
Wait. Do I still have my hair?
Yeah. Just not as much.
Let me guess. I'm a famous outlaw, yeah?
translation.fr:
Laisse-moi deviner :
je suis un célèbre hors-la-loi,

translation.en: Men fear me? Ladies love me?
translation.fr: craint des hommes, adoré des femmes ?

translation.en: You're a doorknob salesman.
What'd you call me?
You're my dad's brother, Philip.
translation.fr: Tu es le frère de mon père, Philip.

translation.en: You and my dad came to Slumberland every night when you were kids.
translation.fr:
Papa et toi exploriez le Monde des rêves
toutes les nuits.

translation.en: And then, he left.
After that, Philip stopped dreaming, and you couldn't wake up.
translation.fr:
Philip a arrêté de rêver,
et tu n'as pas pu te réveiller.

translation.en: I remember.
But when you get your Pearl,
translation.fr: Mais quand tu auras ta perle,

translation.en: you can wake up, and you can be one person again.
translation.fr:
tu te réveilleras
et vous ne ferez plus qu'un.

translation.en: This is a buzzkill.
I'm gonna get us both killed for that guy?
translation.fr: Je risque nos vies pour ce mec-là ?

translation.en: We're so close, and he needs you.
translation.fr:
On est tout près du but,
et il a besoin de toi.

translation.en: Well, I don't need him, all right? I got everything that I want right here.
translation.fr:
Moi, j'ai pas besoin de lui.
J'ai tout ce que je veux ici.

translation.en: Wine, women, waffles. The three dubs.
translation.fr: Vin, femmes, gaufres. Le tiercé gagnant.

translation.en: Not necessarily in that order.
I'm not a knob seller. I'm a flippin' outlaw!
translation.fr:
Je suis pas un vendeur de poignées,
je suis un hors-la-loi !

translation.en: But I thought that when we get our Pearls,
translation.fr:
Mais quand on aura nos perles,
je pourrai être avec papa la nuit,

translation.en: I could be with my dad at night, and during the day, I could be with you.
translation.fr:
Mais quand on aura nos perles,
je pourrai être avec papa la nuit, et avec toi le jour.

translation.en: You could be like my part-time dad.
translation.fr: Tu serais comme mon papa à mi-temps.

translation.en: I am nobody's dad, kid.
translation.fr: Je suis le papa de personne.

translation.en: So you're just giving up?
I'll tell you what I'm gonna do.
I'm gonna go find a dream with a bar in it,
translation.fr: Je vais me trouver un rêve avec un bar

translation.en: and then I'm gonna drink until I forget who I am again.
translation.fr:
et boire
pour oublier à nouveau qui je suis.

translation.en: Then I'm gonna go find someone's ex. 'Cause there's a lot of them around here.
translation.fr:
Puis je trouverai une ex de rêveur,
il y en a plein ici.

translation.en: But I… I did the Double-Knock.
translation.fr: Mais j'ai fait le double toc.

translation.en: So did I, kid.
The night your dad left, I begged him to stay.
translation.fr:
Le soir où ton père est parti,
je l'ai supplié de rester.

translation.en: I'll go without you.
I'll see my dad again, and I don't care if I never wake up.
translation.fr:
Je reverrai mon papa,
et tant pis si je me réveille jamais.

translation.en: Hey, no. You can't.
translation.fr: Non, tu peux pas faire ça.

translation.en: It's too dangerous to go in alone.
You can't tell me what to do… 'cause you're not my dad.
translation.fr:
Tu peux pas me commander,
t'es pas mon père.

translation.en: I never shoulda brought you.
Just go back to where you belong.
Otherwise, you're gonna end up like me.
Nemo.
[in a woman's voice] Nemo. Wake up.
Wake up!
-[Nemo gasps, shudders] -[Arya] Nemo?
Get your things.
We're calling your uncle.
[Arya] It's not just the lying, Nemo.
translation.fr:
Tu n'as pas seulement menti,
tu t'es sauvée en douce.

translation.en: It's sneaking off like that. No one knew where you were.
translation.fr:
Tu n'as pas seulement menti,
tu t'es sauvée en douce. Personne ne savait où tu étais.
Tu aurais pu être en grand danger.

translation.en: For all we knew, you could've been in terrible danger.
translation.fr:
Personne ne savait où tu étais.
Tu aurais pu être en grand danger.

translation.en: Why would you do that? You wouldn't understand.
translation.fr:
- Pourquoi as-tu fait ça ?
- Vous ne comprendriez pas.

translation.en: Why don't you try me?
Well, m-- Maybe it would help if, uh… if you went first.
Philip?
Would you like to tell Nemo how you're feeling?
translation.fr:
Vous avez envie de dire à Nemo
ce que vous ressentez ?

translation.en: I don't know what you want me to say. I don't do feelings.
translation.fr:
Pas vraiment.
Je ne fais pas dans le sentiment.

translation.en: Everyone does feelings, whether you like it or not.
translation.fr:
Tout le monde en a,
que ça vous plaise ou non.

translation.en: You two are in the same boat. You just don't realize it.
translation.fr:
Vous êtes dans le même bateau,
mais vous ne le voyez pas.

translation.en: Guys, come on. You're both struggling with powerful emotions,
translation.fr:
Tous les deux, vous êtes aux prises
avec des émotions.

translation.en: and you just… you just need to deal with them.
translation.fr: Il faut que vous les exprimiez.

translation.en: Do we, though?
Um, everybody always says that, but… I'm not convinced.
translation.fr:
Tout le monde dit ça,
mais je n'en suis pas convaincu.

translation.en: I-- I-- I've [scoffs] I've never dealt with my feelings, and I'm fine.
translation.fr:
Je n'ai jamais exprimé mes sentiments
et je vais très bien.

translation.en: I was fine.
Should've just had them send me to foster care. You'd probably be better off.
translation.fr:
- Tu aurais dû me placer.
- Tu serais sûrement mieux.

translation.en: At least foster parents know how to be parents.
translation.fr:
Les familles d'accueil
savent élever des enfants.

translation.en: Nemo, we should probably talk.
I don't wanna talk. You wanna get rid of me, so get rid of me.
translation.fr:
J'ai pas envie de parler.
Tu veux te débarrasser de moi, vas-y.

translation.en: [sighs] I'm not trying to get rid of you, Nemo. I'm… I'm trying to help you.
translation.fr:
Je ne veux pas me débarrasser de toi,
je veux t'aider.

translation.en: You're as bad as he is.
translation.fr: Tu vaux pas mieux que lui.

translation.en: What? Who?
You only care about yourself.
Are you kidding? I have done nothing but take care of you.
translation.fr:
Tu plaisantes ?
Je n'ai fait que m'occuper de toi.

translation.en: I-- I-- I cook. I-- I entertain.
translation.fr: Je cuisine, je trouve des activités.

translation.en: I try.
And what do I get in return? You just lie to my face.
translation.fr: Et en remerciement, tu me mens.

translation.en: I think we're bonding, and I let you borrow my precious lockpicks so--
translation.fr:
Je crois qu'on se rapproche,
je te prête mes précieux picks…

translation.en: Nobody cares about door stuff, okay? Why do you think you have no friends?
translation.fr:
Les portes, ça intéresse personne.
Pourquoi t'as pas d'amis, à ton avis ?

translation.en: Why do you think you live alone?
You should go to your room!
Where do you think I'm going? You're not my dad!
translation.fr:
Tu crois que je vais où ?
T'es pas mon père !

translation.en: Hey, I'm not trying to be!
I live alone because I like it that way!
translation.fr:
Je vis seul
parce que je suis bien comme ça !

translation.en: I didn't ask for any of this to happen. I didn't ask you to come live here!
translation.fr:
Je n'ai rien demandé,
je ne t'ai pas demandé de venir ici !

translation.en: But I'm glad you did.
translation.fr: Mais je suis content que tu sois là.

translation.en: Pig, we're goin' home.
[Philip] Nemo?
No, I don't know. I don't--
Carla, I don't know. I just woke up, and she wasn't here.
translation.fr:
Je ne sais pas, Carla.
À mon réveil, elle n'était plus là.

translation.en: Well, I have no idea where she would go.
translation.fr: Je ne vois pas où elle peut être allée.

translation.en: Right.
Pig!
[Flip] Oh! The End of the Line!
-It's party time! -[neon sign buzzing]
translation.fr: "Le bout du tunnel" ! C'est la fête !

translation.en: Yeah, baby! Oh!
Number one! Top of Slumberland, baby!
translation.fr: Numéro un ! Au top du Monde des rêves.

translation.en: You see that?
Hope they catch the bastard.
[Flip] Oh, yeah. Guy seems like a real bad egg. You know? Pee-yew.
translation.fr: Oui. Ça a l'air d'être un pourri. Beurk !

translation.en: He took a little girl to the Sea of Nightmares,
translation.fr:
Il a emmené une môme
à la Mer des cauchemars,

translation.en: and then he ditched her, and she went in alone.
translation.fr:
puis il l'a plantée,
et elle y est allée seule.

translation.en: -What? -Yeah.
Hey, you're…
A shiny pink diamond?
-Yeah. Pretty, isn't it? Hi-yah! -That's nice.
[Nemo, echoing] Come on, Pig. Grab one, and let's go.
translation.fr:
Allez, M'sieur Cochon,
prends-en une et on y va.

translation.en: Flip?
[Nemo] Flip!
[Flip] I got ya. Oh!
Get in the cab!
You came back for me!
Yeah. Outlaw Code. Never leave your partner behind.
translation.fr:
Code des hors-la-loi,
on n'abandonne pas son associée.

translation.en: -Even if she is a pain in the… -Applesauce.
translation.fr:
- Même si elle est ch…
- Charmante !

translation.en: Applesauce! [laughs]
Oh! I got a Pearl.
Oh! Aces!
So long, suckers!
Oh, hey! Hey, guys!
-[Pig squeals] -[screaming] Nightmare!
We have to get to the lighthouse! Green said it's my safe place!
translation.fr:
Il faut qu'on aille au phare,
Green dit que c'est mon refuge.

translation.en: I know!
Don't look down!
-Pull up! -I am!
-[Nemo screaming] -Oh my! Oh my!
-[grunting] -[Nemo whimpers] No! Drive the plane!
-Flip, come on. Flip! -[Pig oinks]
[Canadian] Aw, jeez. What a gong show.
Okay, one minute, you think you're going out for a rip…
translation.fr: On croit qu'on part en virée…

translation.en: Oh. Hey, sorry, guy.
And the next thing you know, you're goin' for a dip.
translation.fr: … et en fait, on fait de la plongée.

translation.en: There he is.
-[Canadian whimpering] -Get in here!
Come on. Hey, Emmett, you party? I party.
translation.fr:
- Emmett, t'aimes la fête ?
- J'aime la fête.

translation.en: Come here! Get in here!
[in Southern accent] Hey, Emmett, take a right.
Here we go.
-I can't. I can't. What's that? -Come here, buddy.
translation.fr: Allez, mon grand ! C'est quoi, ça ?

translation.en: Hit it, Emmett!
Help! Oh, my hair! My hair!
[in Spanish] I knew you'd return!
I smelled your musk.
Uh, sí, sí, sí. Pero no.
Pero no.
-[Canadian gasps] -[announcer on TV] Now, McRoy to center. There's O'Reilly… Great pass to Johnson, and a goal!
translation.fr:
McRoy au centre. Voilà O'Reilly…
Belle passe à Joseph qui tire…

translation.en: -He scores! -Yes! Let's go! Let's go!
[sighs] We're gonna make it, kid.
Come on. I see the lighthouse.
Come on, kid. We're almost there. You can finally make your wish.
translation.fr: On y est presque. Tu vas enfin exaucer ton vœu.

translation.en: [gasps] What's wrong?
[weakly] Oh… I don't feel so good.
translation.fr: Je me sens pas très bien.

translation.en: [Flip] Nemo!
[Carla] Hey, slow down! Slow down!
Pig.
[Flip] What's wrong?
[weakly] Something's not right.
translation.fr: Il y a un truc qui va pas.

translation.en: I'm gonna get you home.
You'll be safe at home.
There!
There!
Wait, the Pearl. I dropped the Pearl. We have to go back.
translation.fr:
Attends, la perle.
Je l'ai fait tomber, il faut la ramasser.

translation.en: You get to the lighthouse. I'll get the Pearl, okay? Go.
translation.fr: Va au phare, je ramasse la perle.

translation.en: Wait. No, not without you!
-[Flip grunting] -[Nemo] Flip!
Flip!
-[Flip yelling and grunting] -[Nemo] Flip!
[Flip groaning] Nemo!
[Flip, echoing] Nemo, go! Get to the lighthouse!
Say hi to your dad for me.
translation.fr: Dis bonjour à ton père pour moi.

translation.en: Flip? Wake up.
[Carla] Philip!
What are you doing?
[Carla] No! Get down! Philip! Philip!
[Carla] No!
Let's go home.
Well, this is gonna be a buttload of paperwork.
translation.fr:
Voilà qui va nous faire
une montagne de paperasse.

translation.en: So Nemo, how do you feel? Different?
Big journey, all by yourself.
translation.fr: Après ce grand voyage toute seule ?

translation.en: I see you've found yourself a Pearl.
translation.fr: Tu t'es trouvé une perle, je vois.

translation.en: Guess it's not a myth after all.
translation.fr: Ce n'est donc pas une légende.

translation.en: I didn't get my dad back.
translation.fr: Je n'ai pas retrouvé mon père.

translation.en: You had to give up your dream.
translation.fr: Tu as renoncé à ton rêve.

translation.en: I guess you found something more important.
translation.fr:
Tu as dû trouver
quelque chose de plus important.

translation.en: Right, better get to work, then.
You've got a good pig there.
Give it a squeeze for me.
-[Pig grunts] -[Green] Told you.
You have the dream you're meant to have.
translation.fr:
Tu fais le rêve
que tu es destinée à faire.

translation.en: We make sure of that.
What you do next…?
Well, that's up to you.
Ugh! Seriously? Look at this mess!
Can I get a cleaning crew in here pronto?
translation.fr: Vous pouvez m'envoyer une équipe de nettoyage, illico ?

translation.en: Come on!
[crying] I missed you so much.
I miss you.
Race you to the top?
Help!
-Nemo! She's not breathing. -[Carla] Okay.
We got her! We got her. It's okay. Okay.
translation.fr: On s'occupe d'elle, ça va aller.

translation.en: Did you ever figure it out? What the lighthouse is for?
translation.fr: Tu as trouvé à quoi sert le phare, alors ?

translation.en: -[Pig oinking] -It's not to keep ships safe.
translation.fr: Pas à la sécurité des bateaux.

translation.en: No. If we wanted to do that, we'd never let 'em leave harbor, would we?
translation.fr:
Pour leur sécurité, on ne les laisserait jamais
quitter le port.

translation.en: [Carla] Nothing. Okay. One, two, three, four, five, six.
-Come on, Nemo! -[Carla] Seven, eight, nine.
-[Philip] Breathe! -[Carla] Come on. Oh.
To guide you on your journey.
translation.fr: Il nous guide sur le chemin.

translation.en: That's right.
So you can see things that the lighthouse keeper can only dream of.
translation.fr:
Pour qu'on voie des choses
que le gardien de phare rêve de voir.

translation.en: I didn't teach you all those things so you could live on an island.
translation.fr:
Je ne t'ai pas appris tout ça
pour que tu vives sur une île.

translation.en: I did it so that you could know…
translation.fr: Je l'ai fait pour que tu saches…

translation.en: you can do anything.
[Carla] Okay, come on, Nemo.
One, two, three…
I didn't think I could go on without you.
translation.fr: Je pensais pas pouvoir vivre sans toi.

translation.en: You traveled to the Sea of Nightmares and came back home safe again.
translation.fr: Tu es allée jusqu'à la Mer des cauchemars et tu es rentrée saine et sauve.

translation.en: After that, I don't think the Waking World's gonna be too difficult.
translation.fr:
Après ça, le monde réel
devrait être un jeu d'enfant.

translation.en: But that's up to you.
translation.fr: Mais c'est à toi de voir.

translation.en: Life is waiting for you, Nemo.
It would be a shame to miss that.
translation.fr: Ce serait dommage de passer à côté.

translation.en: [crying] I have to go back.
That's my girl.
[takes a deep breath] And you never forget…
how very proud I am of you.
translation.fr: combien je suis fier de toi.

translation.en: And keep an eye on that brother of mine.
translation.fr: Garde un œil sur mon frangin.

translation.en: He seems normal, but he's not.
translation.fr:
Il a l'air ordinaire,
mais il ne l'est pas.

translation.en: Deep down, he's a wild man.
translation.fr: Au fond, il a un grain.

translation.en: Bye, Dad.
[Carla] Okay, let's go! Come on, get her over!
There we go! Good girl, Nemo! -[laughing] Good girl! -[Philip sobbing]
[Carla] Good girl.
You're okay. You're okay.
I got you. And I'm not gonna let go of you ever, okay?
translation.fr:
Je suis là,
et je te laisserai jamais tomber.

translation.en: Flip?
[softly] Yeah. [mimics Flip] It's Flip.
And Philip. Philip and Flip.
Flilip? [high-pitched snicker]
-[Undeadheads groan] -[Nemo] Bye, Jamal. See you tomorrow.
You know, not a lot of people know this, but I'm actually a master pickpocket.
translation.fr:
Personne ne le sait,
mais je suis un pickpocket de génie.

translation.en: Oh, come on. No, you're not. [chuckles]
-Oh my G-- -You have very smooth wrists.
translation.fr:
- Ça alors !
- Vos poignets glissent bien.

translation.en: [Arya] Wait. What? How did you…?
I'm gonna take you sailing.
Maybe next time you can come with us.
translation.fr: Vous pourriez venir, la prochaine fois.

translation.en: Yeah, I'd love to. [chuckles]
Aces.
Oh. Oh, wait. I need my watch back. [Philip and Arya laugh] Yeah.
No. No, seriously. Can I get my watch back?
translation.fr: Sérieusement, je peux avoir ma montre ?

translation.en: [quietly] Call me.
Oh, great. You're already dressed for bed.
translation.fr: Parfait, tu es prête pour dormir.

translation.en: [Nemo] Well, I don't like to be late.
So, what's the plan tonight?
I don't know. I think I might just wander and see what happens.
translation.fr:
Je sais pas, je pense me balader
et voir ce qui se passe.

translation.en: Sounds good.
-Night-night, kiddo. I love you. -I love you too.
translation.fr:
- Bonne nuit, ma grande. Je t'aime.
- Moi aussi.

translation.en: -I'll try to be on time. -[Nemo giggles]
Sweet dreams.
